xmlquery.searchMenu: Select a.idMenu, a.description, a.href, a.hasChildren from smhris_menu a inner join smhris_role_menu b on a.idMenu=b.idMenu where a.displayed = 'Y' and b.idRole=?
xmlquery.searchMenuP: Select * from smhris_menu where description like ?
xmlquery.checkRoleAccess: select * from smhris_menu a where a.href = ? and a.idMenu in (select b.idMenu from smhris_role_menu b where b.idRole in (select c.idRole from smhris_role_user c where c.uid in (select d.uid from smhris_employee d where d.uid = ?)))
